nodes.text: Maslovar Tiatiov was a man who served as the military leader of the planet Desevro.

When the Human Xim became the king of the Kingdom of Cron, he lead an attack on the worlds of the Livien League, including Desevro. After completely defeating the League on Jhantoria, he planned to raze Desevro to the ground, but was persuaded not to by Tiatiov. The Desevrar leader took Xim on a tour of the planet's fighting academies and showed Xim the efficiency of the planet's bureaucracy, persuading the king to spare the planet.
